title: Train fault causing delays between Bukit Panjang and Choa Chu Kang

title_translations.zh-Hans: 列车故障导致武吉班让和蔡厝港之间延误
title_translations.ms: Kereta api rosak menyebabkan kelewatan antara Bukit Panjang dan Choa Chu Kang
title_translations.ta: Bukit Panjang மற்றும் Choa Chu Kang இடையே தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் ரயில் பழுது

updates.text: [BPLRT]: CLEARED Train service between #BukitPanjang and #ChoaChuKang are now running normally.
[BPLRT]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time between #BukitPanjang and #ChoaChuKang due to train fault at #Phoenix.
